Apiorkor Seyiram Ashongábbey (amụrụ n'ụbọchị mbụ n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1988) bụ onye Ghana na-ede uri, onye edemede, onye na-enyocha akwụkwọ. Ọ bu ugbu a onye isi nke mmemme mmepụta na Citi FM / Citi TV ma bụrụkwa onye na-elekọta ikikere Diplomatiki na ihe na-esi nri na Citi TV.
Ọ bụkwa onye ndụmọdụ nchịkọta akụkọ maka The InfluencHER Project, mmemme nchịkọta akụkọ ya na obodo zuru ụwa ọnụ na-achọ ịnye ike na ime ka olu ụmụ nwanyị dị-kwuo elu.

Apiorkor gara na-ụlo akwụkwọ Tema International School ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ma mechaa mmemme Dipuloma. O mechara gaa Lafayette College n'obodo US, wee laghachi obodo Ghana iji gụọ na Mahadum Ghana, Legon
Apiorkor bụ onye isi mmepụta na Citi FM / Citi TV na onye na-elekọta ikikere na 'Ihe na-esi nri' na Citi TV.

Apiorkor bụ onye dere Amaokwu nke Nna Ukwu, akwụkwọ uri nke na-achọ ime ememe, ịma aka, ma gosiputa ihe ọ pụtara ịbụ onye obodo Ghana na narị afọ nke iri abụọ na otu, nke a na-eme site n'echiche ya dị ka nwatakịrị ọdịbendị nke atọ.
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na mbipụta afọ 2019 nke Republica nke emere na Berlin, Germany.
Apiorkor rụrụ na mbipụta afọ 2020 nke TEDWomen nke bụ nzukọ TED kwa afọ nke isi ụlọ ọrụ TED dị na obodo New York, USA haziri.)
Apiorkor rụrụ ọrụ n'afọ 2021 Sundance Film Festival nke emere na Park City, Salt Lake City, Utah na-obodo United States
N'afọ 2022, Ghana Association of Writers (GAW) nyere Apiorkor onyinye dị ka onye mmeri mbụ maka ụdị Okwu a na-ekwu na mbipụta nke isii nke onyinye ndị otu ahụ.
